main_definition: Farming refers to the primary activity of cultivating land, raising crops, and/or rearing animals for food or other products.

meanings_and_examples.example: The farming community in our town thrives on growing various crops and raising livestock.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Hobby or personal activity related to cultivating plants
meanings_and_examples.example: Kevin enjoys small-scale farming as a hobby, tending to his vegetable garden in the backyard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The practice of managing and caring for animals on a farm
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to pursue a career in livestock management, focusing on farming chickens and pigs.
He plans to start an agribusiness farm, specializing in organic produce and sustainable farming methods.

additional_definitions.definition: The process of cultivating land or tending crops
additional_definitions.example: Farming the fields involves plowing, sowing seeds and harvesting at the right time.

additional_definitions.definition: Using fertilizers or other chemicals to enhance crop growth
additional_definitions.example: The farmer uses agrochemicals to ensure a healthy yield for his cornfield.
